trans-unit.source: Specifies the requested accuracy level for the location data that the application uses.
trans-unit.target: 指定应用程序使用位置数据的请求的精度级别。

trans-unit.source: The requested accuracy can be specified in the constructor for <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 可以在<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>的构造函数中指定所请求的准确性

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> is created with an accuracy level of Default.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>使用默认的精度级别创建的。</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>

trans-unit.source: An accuracy level of High may degrade system performance and should be used only when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 高的精度级别可能会降低系统性能，并应仅在必要时使用。

trans-unit.source: Optimize for power, performance, and other cost considerations.
trans-unit.target: 针对 power、 性能和其他优化成本注意事项。

trans-unit.source: Deliver the most accurate report possible.
trans-unit.target: 传递可能最准确的报表。

trans-unit.source: This includes using services that might charge money, or consuming higher levels of battery power or connection bandwidth.
trans-unit.target: 这包括使用可能收费的服务或使用更高级别的电池电量或连接的带宽。
